description: This file defines a Flutter widget named `ProfileOverlay` used to display a slide-in profile and menu panel, with associated sub-widgets and internal logic for UI interactions.
external_methods: Widgets, Theme.of, FocusableActionDetector, GestureDetector, AnimatedScale, AnimatedOpacity, IgnorePointer, AnimatedPositioned, Container, BoxDecoration, Text, Row, Column, SizedBox, Padding, TextButton.icon, Icon, StatelessWidget, StatefulWidget, FocusNode, setState, dispose, build

classes.name: ProfileOverlay
classes.description: A reusable slide-in panel widget that displays user profile info and menu items, overlaying other content.

classes.name: _Panel
classes.description: Internal widget representing the content panel including user info and menu items.

classes.name: _OverlayItem
classes.description: Stateful widget representing individual menu items with hover and focus effects.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the main `ProfileOverlay`, including animation and gesture handling.

methods.name: _Panel.build
methods.description: Builds the content panel with user info and menu items.

methods.name: _OverlayItem.build
methods.description: Builds the individual menu item with hover, focus, and pressed state handling.
